survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences and behaviors related to sustainable fashion, including purchase motivations, barriers, and brand perceptions.

questions.question_text: How often do you purchase clothing items labeled as 'sustainable' or 'eco-friendly'?
answer_options: Very frequently (more than 6 times a year)
questions.client_notes: Use a balanced Likert scale to capture frequency accurately. Ensure the scale is intuitive.

script.question_text: How often do you purchase clothing items labeled as 'sustainable' or 'eco-friendly'?
answer_options: Very frequently (more than 6 times a year)

questions.question_text: What factors most influence your decision to purchase sustainable fashion? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Allow multi-select to capture multiple influences. Include an 'Other' option for flexibility.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Multi-choice checkboxes with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What factors most influence your decision to purchase sustainable fashion? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: What is the primary barrier that prevents you from purchasing sustainable fashion more often?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option to capture unique barriers. Randomize options to avoid order bias.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Single-choice radio buttons with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What is the primary barrier that prevents you from purchasing sustainable fashion more often?

questions.question_text: How much more are you willing to pay for a sustainable fashion item compared to a conventional one?
questions.client_notes: Use percentage ranges for clarity. Ensure the scale is logical and easy to understand.

script.question_text: How much more are you willing to pay for a sustainable fashion item compared to a conventional one?

questions.question_text: Which of the following sustainable fashion brands are you familiar with? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Include well-known and niche brands to gauge awareness. Allow multi-select.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Multi-choice checkboxes with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which of the following sustainable fashion brands are you familiar with? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How do you typically verify the sustainability claims of a fashion brand? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Capture multiple verification methods. Randomize options to avoid bias.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Multi-choice checkboxes with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: How do you typically verify the sustainability claims of a fashion brand? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What type of sustainable fashion items do you purchase most often? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multi-select to capture diverse purchasing habits. Include an 'Other' option.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Multi-choice checkboxes with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What type of sustainable fashion items do you purchase most often? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How important is it for you that a fashion brand discloses its supply chain and labor practices?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure importance. Ensure the scale is balanced.

script.question_text: How important is it for you that a fashion brand discloses its supply chain and labor practices?

questions.question_text: Have you ever stopped purchasing from a brand due to concerns about its sustainability or ethical practices?
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no question to gauge brand loyalty impacts.

script.question_text: Have you ever stopped purchasing from a brand due to concerns about its sustainability or ethical practices?

questions.question_text: If you answered 'Yes' to the previous question, please briefly describe the reason for stopping.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture detailed reasons. Keep optional for 'No' responses.

script.question_text: If you answered 'Yes' to the previous question, please briefly describe the reason for stopping.

questions.question_text: What additional information would help you make more informed sustainable fashion purchases?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture unique insights. Encourage detailed responses.

script.question_text: What additional information would help you make more informed sustainable fashion purchases?
